title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.179 - Liquid asset
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.179 - Liquid asset

State Regulations

Cash in banks and on hand, and other cash assets not set
aside for specific purposes other than the payment of a current liability, or a
readily marketable investment. The term is somewhat less restrictive than cash
asset and much more restrictive than quick asset. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.179

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
